plot: A young couple travels to Mars to celebrate a birthday which will end becoming a great adventure. In the red planet they will face all kinds of dangers to be able to go back home safely.
title: Mars Picnic
plot_es: A young couple travels to Mars to celebrate a birthday which will end becoming a great adventure. In the red planet they will face all kinds of dangers to be able to go back home safely.
plot_en: A young couple travels to Mars to celebrate a birthday which will end becoming a great adventure. In the red planet they will face all kinds of dangers to be able to go back home safely.
